intro: Menotriche, commonly known as the "scentless nightshade," is a flowering plant belonging to the Solanaceae family. It is characterized by its small, bell-shaped flowers that typically bloom in the evening. The plant has simple, alternate leaves that are usually oval or ovate in shape. Its fruit is a globose berry that changes color from green to yellow or red as it matures. Menotriche is native to various regions in Africa and is often found in woodland or shrubland habitats.
